vocabinfos.mediumDef:
People descended from Chereth(?), first mentioned at 1Sa.30.14
§ Cherethites = "executioners"
1) a group of foreign mercenary soldiers serving as a bodyguard for king David; also executioners
2) either Cretans or proto-Philistines (in general)
vocabinfos._es_Definition: (a) פְּלִשְׁתִּי   otro nombre para los filisteos; (b)   nombre de la guardia real deDavid
vocabinfos._zh_tw_Definition:
基利提人 这个形容詞在希伯來文的意思是 "行刑人"
1) 一群作大衛王侍衛的外國的傭兵; 也是行刑人
2) 克里特島人或原始的非利士人 (一般用法)
vocabinfos._zh_Definition:
基利提人 这个形容词在希伯来文的意思是 "行刑人"
1) 一群作大卫王侍卫的外国的佣兵; 也是行刑人
2) 克里特岛人或原始的非利士人 (一般用法)

vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A group, first mentioned at 2Sa.8.18; also called Carite at 2Ki.11.4,19;
Also named: ka.ri (כָּרִי "Carite" H3746)
§ Cherethites = "executioners"
1) a group of foreign mercenary soldiers serving as a bodyguard for king David; also executioners
2) either Cretans or proto-Philistines (in general)
